<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Dead Fane](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2437)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +32

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +36, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +33, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +33, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +30, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +30

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +5

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +32 

</row>

**HP** 315

**Give Them the Slip** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Dead Faine gains the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20), [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) condition; **Effect** Dead Faine slips out of his disguise to escape; he removes the grabbed, immobilized, and restrained conditions imposed by the triggering event, then he Steps. If Dead Faine is currently [Impersonating](/Actions.aspx?ID=46), his disguise is ruined, and he's exposed as himself.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_dagger_ +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d4+8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 bludgeoning

**Innate Occult Spells** DC 35
- **2nd**
[Mimic Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=948) (×2)
- **3rd**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159)
- **5th**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Adopt Persona** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Dead Faine attempts a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46). He doesn't take a penalty to this check due to lacking a [disguise kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), to appear as an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), or to appear as a specific individual.

**Feinting Strike** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Requirements** Dead Faine is within melee reach of an enemy; **Effect** Dead Faine [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), then Strikes the target of his Feint.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Dead Faine deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. This increases to 6d6 against creatures flat-footed due to Dead Faine's Feint or Traitorous Betrayal.

**Traitorous Betrayal** <actions string="Two Actions" />  Dead Faine Interacts to draw his dagger and Strikes with it. If the target believes Dead Faine was anyone other than himself, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against Dead Faine's attack.

</column>
name: Dead Fane
